players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, keep an eye on Charlie. He's the detective."
Charlie: "Diana, be cautious. You're suspected of being the mafioso."
You: "Will do, Diana. Let's keep each other safe."
You: "I'll watch out for both of you. Let's gather more info tonight."
Diana: "Bob, keep an eye on Charlie. Diana, be cautious."
Charlie: "Bob, continue investigation. Diana, watch your back."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, keep an eye on Charlie. He's the detective."
You: "Diana, be cautious. You're suspected of being the mafioso."
Bob: "Will do, Diana. Let's keep each other safe."
Bob: "I'll watch out for both of you. Let's gather more info tonight."
Diana: "Bob, keep an eye on Charlie. Diana, be cautious."
You: "Bob, continue investigation. Diana, watch your back."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob, keep an eye on Charlie. He's the detective."
Charlie: "Diana, be cautious. You're suspected of being the mafioso."
Bob: "Will do, Diana. Let's keep each other safe."
Bob: "I'll watch out for both of you. Let's gather more info tonight."
You: "Bob, keep an eye on Charlie. Diana, be cautious."
Charlie: "Bob, continue investigation. Diana, watch your back."
